desc: Senpai, this is the Dorm for the Girls, let me show you around~
Click here to purchase furniture pieces with Furniture Coins
Tap here to edit the layout of the Dorm freely. Yuki hopes Senpai can make the Dorm a beautiful and cozy place for the Girls~
This is the Comfort level of your dorm. Tap here to claim the rewards from the Dorm. The more comfortable furniture you own, the more rewards you can get~
You can adjust the name of your Dorm any time by tapping here~
Tap here to see the rules. You can find the answers to your questions here!
Tap here to choose the Girls to stay in the Dorm. Senpai will be able to interact with the Girls here~
